ScribbleMate Help

Welcome to the ScribbleMate Help page.

Installation

To install the ScribbleMate add-in, follow these steps:

  1. Open Microsoft Word.
  2. Click on the "Insert" tab in the ribbon.
  3. In the add-ins section, install ScribbleMate.
  4. Launch ScribbleMate from the ribbon.

Using ScribbleMate

To use ScribbleMate, follow these instructions:

  1. First, provide your OpenAI API key. Don't forget to set up your desired alert and usage limits.
  2. After the API key is verified, select the text you want to use as input.
  3. Specify the number of options you want the model to generate.
  4. Click the "Suggest Text" button to generate the options.
  5. The first generated option will be inserted at the end of your selected input.
  6. Use the arrow buttons to navigate between the generated options.
  7. Make sure you do not select any text while navigating between the options. If you do, the options will be inserted at the end of the newly selected text.
  8. Utilize the highlight button to highlight the inserted options.
  9. When you're finished, you can click the "Clear All" button to remove the highlight and clear suggestions.

Limitations

This add-in is specifically crafted to excel as a "fluff" generator, serving as a valuable tool for writers seeking to enrich their scenes and bring them to life. Whether you're looking to add depth to a setting, embellish the details of a character's appearance, or create vivid sensory experiences, this add-in is adept at providing creative descriptions that captivate readers.

Moreover, it proves invaluable in those moments when you find yourself grappling for the perfect word. Perhaps you're trying to recall a term that's just on the tip of your tongue, or you sense there's a more precise and evocative word to express a concept, but it eludes you. This add-in can help bridge that gap, offering a wide range of alternatives and synonyms to enhance your writing.

That said, while it excels in adding color and detail to your writing, it is not designed to continue your plot or develop complex narrative arcs. Its strength lies in enhancing individual paragraphs rather than driving the overall story forward.

If you have any feedback or ideas for improvement, or if you encounter any issues while using the ScribbleMate add-in, please feel free to reach out at support@writingwizard.com.
